name: CryptoCars
description:
CryptoCars is an endless car game launched at the beginning of 2022. The game displays the interest of a 23-year-old university student who just got into cars. Throughout his first university winter break, he explores the possibility of learning things via the internet. He has explored creating content, coming up with WordPress, Forex trading. After learning more about NFTs, he has started creating images for his second collection on his newfound interest. Furthermore, he has created a game; CryptoCars, drawing inspiration from his NFT collection.

Check out the NFT collection at https://opensea.io/collection/crypto-garage-1
